name: Viper
title: Netherdrake
lore: Born in the Nether Reaches, Viper is a venomous drake who corrupts all he touches.

poisonAttack.name: Poison Attack
poisonAttack.description: Viper's attacks poison enemies, dealing damage over time and slowing.

nethertoxin.name: Nethertoxin
nethertoxin.description: Covers an area with toxin that damages enemies and disables passive abilities.

corrosiveSkin.name: Corrosive Skin
corrosiveSkin.description: Viper's skin poisons attackers, dealing damage and slowing them. Also grants magic resistance.

viperStrike.name: Viper Strike
viperStrike.description: Launches a venom blast that massively slows and damages an enemy over time.
